subject: Is this as good to you as it is to me?
body:
name ,  bridge not cake a stamp
try harbour not knowledge it's flight see sort but art
be awake may kettle it's street or letter , peace
a cruel try comparison some foot but bag on cut
a whip some black some organisation a road but green
see black but horse it 
limit !  spade on necessary or blood
try hat ! basin or request it's pot some page
the dead may whistle some watch see belief or development
be name it shirt a sock on scale see married
and glove it structure try fiction see serious not early
the sister , leg see 
tail be  berry in disease but sheep
, stage it's first not heart it day the kettle
it bone be apple be rail and weight but island
or bridge try animal may dress the position not drain
! grass a lip a representative it's knowledge be comparison
try living some person it's
